replies.body: so you could befriend a noob and then gift yourself heaps of RP after getting them to give account details??

if anyone is looking for a method to obtain free rp simply follow these steps

1. make a smurf
2. get it into bronze 5 ranked solo queue
3. get hell fed every game; have insane averages
4.add bronze/silver players telling them "you don't belong bronze, I will help you get out :)"
5. outrank them, let them know that it affects your mmr when you lose games with them, let them know that you are happy to go on their acc and win some games if they like. 
6. purchase yourself new skins/champions, then delete their rune pages
Then watch as both your accounts are perma banned.

But yesterday my friend tried to send me a mystery gift, it was a Caitlyn Safari Skin, it said he had sent it to me while i was in game but once the game had finished he had sent nothing, :( :( i'm really sad that it never went through and he was mad because he had just wasted 480 RP on a gift that was ****Deleted**** So we are begging for a refund on his Money PLEASE.
Contact support, they're the only ones who can help you.

The only thing we asked for was to up the cap on the limit of gifts you can send so thanks for that.
The level change stuff seems weird but whatever. Guess you want people to make smurfs and easily gift their smurfs? I dont know.

The 1 day thing does seem a bit off, but I guess if you gift a random person in a post match lobby, kinda dumb to wait 2 weeks if you want to gift a newly added friend.
Finaly! I love this.
